question:
You are a math expert. When you respond, respond only with the Solution of the final Problem, thinking step by step. At the end of the Solution, when you give your final answer, write it in the form 'Final Answer: \\boxed{$answer$}. I hope it is correct.'
What is the positive difference between the median and the mode of the data given in the stem and leaf plot below? In this plot $5|8$ represents $58.$

\begin{tabular}{|c|c|}\hline
\textbf{Tens} & \textbf{Units} \\ \hline
1 & $2 \hspace{2mm} 3 \hspace{2mm} 4 \hspace{2mm} 5 \hspace{2mm} 5$ \\ \hline
2 & $2 \hspace{2mm} 2 \hspace{2mm} 2 \hspace{2mm} \hspace{2mm} \hspace{2mm} \hspace{1.5mm}$ \\ \hline
3 & $1 \hspace{2mm} 1 \hspace{2mm} 8 \hspace{2mm} 9 \hspace{2mm} \hspace{1.9mm}$ \\ \hline
4 & $ 0 \hspace{2mm} 1 \hspace{2mm} 2 \hspace{2mm} 3 \hspace{2mm} \hspace{1.9mm}$ \\ \hline
5 & $ 2 \hspace{2mm} 8 \hspace{2mm} 9 \hspace{2mm} \hspace{2mm} \hspace{2mm} \hspace{1.5mm}$ \\\hline
\end{tabular}
inference:
The data represented in the stem and leaf plot are:
12, 13, 14, 15, 15
22, 22, 22
31, 31, 38, 39
40, 41, 42, 43
52, 58, 59

Arranging the data in ascending order:
12, 13, 14, 15, 15, 22, 22, 22, 31, 31, 38, 39, 40, 41, 42, 43, 52, 58, 59

Counting the data points: There are 19 data points.
The median is the middle value when the data is arranged in ascending order.
Since there are 19 data points, the median is the 10th value, which is 38.

The mode is the value that appears most frequently in the data set.
The number 22 appears 3 times, which is more than any other number.
So the mode is 22.

The positive difference between the median and the mode is:
38 - 22 = 16

Final Answer: $\boxed{16}$
ground_truth: The mode is the number that appears the most often, or $22.$ The median is the number that has half the other numbers greater than it and half less than it, or $31.$ The positive difference between the two is $31-22=\boxed{9}.$
